data.eml:eml: New species of sponges (Porifera, Demospongiae) from the Aleutian Islands and Gulf of Alaska

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Lehnert, Helmut, Stone, Robert P. (2015): New species of sponges (Porifera, Demospongiae) from the Aleutian Islands and Gulf of Alaska. Zootaxa 4033 (4): 451-483, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4033.4.1
